verses.text: God \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* refuge \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strength, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* very present help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* trouble.

Therefore \w will|strong="H5797"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* not fear, though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* earth do change, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* mountains be moved \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* heart \w of|strong="H4268"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* seas;

Though \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters thereof roar \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* troubled, though \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w shake|strong="H4131"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* swelling thereof. \qs Selah\qs*

\w There|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* river, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* streams whereof \w make|strong="H1993"\w* glad \w the|strong="H2022"\w* city \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* holy place \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* tabernacles \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* Most High.

God \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H8055"\w* midst \w of|strong="H5892"\w* her; \w she|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5892"\w* moved: God \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* help her, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* right early.

\w The|strong="H7130"\w* nations raged, \w the|strong="H7130"\w* kingdoms \w were|strong="H1077"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*: \w he|strong="H1242"\w* uttered \w his|strong="H7130"\w* voice, \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth melted.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* hosts \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H6963"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* refuge. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w*, behold \w the|strong="H3068"\w* works \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, what desolations \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* wars \w to|strong="H3068"\w* cease \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* end \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* breaketh \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bow, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cutteth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* spear \w in|strong="H3068"\w* sunder; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* burneth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire.

\w Be|strong="H7665"\w* \w still|strong="H7673"\w*, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* know \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am God: \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w among|strong="H7097"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* nations, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* exalted \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* hosts \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* refuge. \qs Selah\qs*
